entry.title: Receive between $2K - $30K to build out your ideas via the @womenbuildweb3 accelerator program 🔥 The program takes place online, so anyone in the w...
entry.summary: Receive between $2K - $30K to build out your ideas via the @womenbuildweb3 accelerator program 🔥 The program takes place online, so anyone in the world can participate. Applications still open for a short time. Kicks off on Oct 13th! 🛠 WBW3 - BUIDL Accelerator: GM buildoooors, we’re very excited to announce that the application for our accelerator program is NOW LIVE! 🚀 We’re giving out no strings attached grants of $2K - $30K to support innovative engineering projects ✨🧵 More details and application: https://www.womenbuildweb3.com/accelerator https://twitter.com/encodeclub/status/1574792333400281088

entry.summary: RT Radek | velvetshark.eth After a @developer_dao workshop by @dabit3 this Wednesday, I'll run my own with them on Friday. Tune in to see how to create on-chain SVG NFTs. From zero to live collection in one hour! Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Then we have @velvet_shark walking us through how to create & deploy a 100% on-chain SVG NFT 😎 💅 Tune in on Friday @ 4:30pm UTC 👉 Don't miss these they're set to be excellent sessions with two awseomse educators from the D_D Community. https://youtu.be/Hfga2UjupVU
